headline: California wildfire fund may shield Edison balance sheet from fire claims, company says
summary: Southern California Edison, one of the state's largest electric utilities, faces a swelling number of lawsuits claiming its power lines caused the Eaton Fire in the foothills near Pasadena.  The California Wildfire Fund, which allows the state's utilities to recover some wildfire-related claims payments, has $21 billion and has been largely untapped by investor-owned utilities like Southern California Edison, Edison International CEO Pedro Pizarro said on a call with investors.

headline: Edison International (EIX) Q4 Earnings Lag Estimates
summary: Edison International (EIX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -2.78% and 4.86%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Edison International, Southern California Edison Declare Dividends
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 27, 2025--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8275 per share, to be paid on April 30, 2025, to holders of record on April 7, 2025.

headline: Edison International Reports Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Results
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 27, 2025--Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today reported fourth-quarter net income of $340 million, or $0.88 per share, compared to net income of $378 million, or $0.99 per share, in the fourth quarter of last year. As adjusted, fourth-quarter core earnings were $405 million, or $1.05 per share, compared to core earnings of $490 million, or $1.28 per share, in the fourth quarter of last year.
